parameters.name: Cover
parameters.description: The cover image of the story. You can specify an image as the cover image of the custom story.

parameters.name: CustomLabels
parameters.description: The custom labels. You can specify labels to help you identify and retrieve the story.

parameters.name: Files
parameters.description: The files of the story. You can specify up to 100 files in a custom story.

parameters.name: StorySubType
parameters.description: The subtype of the story. For information about valid subtypes, see [Story types and subtypes](~~2743998~~).

parameters.name: StoryType
parameters.description: The type of the story. For information about valid types, see [Story types and subtypes](~~2743998~~).
